forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
The way I use is this:  

1. Boot to WinPE (v2 or v3)  
2. Prepare HDD using Diskpart  
3. Copy contents of XP CD from USB drive folder to HDD  
4. Run winnt32.exe  
5. Reboot and allow HDD to boot and continue XP setup  

If interested I can give more details.  

You will need to add i386\\unattend.txt to fully automate it.
